title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Machinery for Improving Hazard Awareness in Construction Material Handling Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental statistical concepts and basic smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can classify four types of hazardous material-handling incidents with ≥75% accuracy using smartphone sensor data.
Learners can explain and apply data preprocessing steps (splitting and feature extraction) to real-world datasets.
Understand the fundamental principles of the Random Forest algorithm and apply them to classification problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
